what: PEcAn Package for Integration of the RothC Model
title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the RothC Model
text: PEcAn Coupler RothC Model Work progress. package following PEcAn’s standard iterative process toward full model coupling: Download, compile, test run jobs.sh existing test run write.configs existing test run Partial: soil C written test run PEcAn interface Partial: Evaporation still hard-coded 0 parameters write.configs extend list PFTs, priors initial conditions read/write restart non-met inputs

title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the RothC Model
text: See inst/example_workflow set scripts run multisite ensemble simulations soil organic carbon content. TODO: consider converting vignette.

title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the RothC Model
text: can install development version PEcAn.RothC r-universe: can install directly GitHub remotes package: ``` r remotes::install_github(‘pecanproject/pecan’, subdir = “models/RothC”) local clone PEcAn development repository, follow directions provided PEcAn (short: use make install).
code: options(   repos = c(     getOption("repos"),     pecanproject = 'https://pecanproject.r-universe.dev'   ) ) install.packages('PEcAn.RothC')

what: Extract monthly weather from CF file for input to RothC — met2model.RothC
title: Extract monthly weather from CF file for input to RothC — met2model.RothC
text: Input files need named `<.path>/<.prefix>.YYYY.nc`

title: Extract monthly weather from CF file for input to RothC — met2model.RothC
code: met2model.RothC(   in.path,   in.prefix,   outfolder,   start_date,   end_date,   overwrite = FALSE )

title: Extract monthly weather from CF file for input to RothC — met2model.RothC
text: .path path disk CF files live .prefix prefix file outfolder location model specific output written. start_date, end_date start end output. Specify exact dates, output padded whole months. overwrite logical: replace output files already exist?

title: Extract monthly weather from CF file for input to RothC — met2model.RothC
text: data frame summarizing file metadata

title: Extract monthly weather from CF file for input to RothC — met2model.RothC
text: Output files named `<outfolder>/<.prefix>.YY-mm.YY-mm.dat` one line per month columns temperature, rainfall, evaporation. Note created file contains weather data soil management data needed RothC's single combined input file. See `write.config.RothC()` assembly model-ready RothC_input.dat`.

title: Extract monthly weather from CF file for input to RothC — met2model.RothC
text: Chris Black
